model.company

Interface RemoteCompany

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Company

    public interface RemoteCompany
extends java.rmi.Remote
    interface that give RMI methods from company service to clients
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Egor Shilkin

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      return company director

      go out from company

      select staff with certain experience

      sort staff by work experience in company

      • selectSpecificStaff

        java.util.List<Staff> selectSpecificStaff(double experience,
                                          java.lang.String department)
                                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        select staff by both parameters(department and below certain work experience)
        Parameters:
        experience - maximum work experience
        department - name of the department staff works in
        Returns:
        list of staff with required department with experience below parameter
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • selectStaffByDepartment

        java.util.List<Staff> selectStaffByDepartment(java.lang.String department)

        select staff of certain department
        Parameters:
        department - name of the department whose staff is required
        Returns:
        list of staff from required department

        Parameters:
        minExp - minimal years of work
        maxExp - maximum years of work
        Returns:
        list of staff with defined experience
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
